name: Chivo Mono
description: Chivo (‘goat’ in Spanish) is the first Omnibus-Type neo-grotesque typeface family. Its solidness and balanced strokes give Chivo both elegance and practicality. Chivo Mono is the monospace sibling of Chivo . Likewise, Chivo Mono is a variable font ranging from Thin to Black with matching Italics. The family was developed by Héctor Gatti. To contribute, see github.com/Omnibus-Type/Chivo .
author: Omnibus-Type
